name: Catriona Graf
content: Matriarch Catriona Graf was a human female who was the head of the Graf family during the High Republic Era. Catriona had a daughter and a grandson, Xylan. She conspired with the scientist Chancey Yarrow and the Nihil pirates, using the family company to build Tempest Runner Lourna Dee's starship, as well as assisting in Yarrow's experiments in constructing a gravity well projector. When the Galactic Republic and Jedi Order discovered Catriona and the Grafs' duplicity, the family's assets were frozen, but Catriona escaped justice aboard Everbloom, the family's mobile estate, and met with Yarrow to discuss her new lab in the Hynestian sector.
